Translations.Text: Deklamuyutʹ dlya nykh virna istoriya Adam dva syna. Vony zrobyly proponuvannya, ta bulo vyznane z odnoho z nykh, ale ne z inshyy. Vin skazav, "ya bezsumnivno ub'yu vas." Vin skazav, "BOH vyznaye tilʹky z spravedlyvyy
Yakshcho vy prostyahayete vashu ruku ubyty meni, ya ne prostyahayu moyu ruku ubyty vas. Dlya I BOHA povahy, Lorda vsesvitu
ya bazhayu vas, ne meni, shchob rodyty miy hrikh ta vash hrikh, todi vy zakinchuyete z dwellers Pekla. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu requital dlya porushnykiv
Yoho ego sprovokuvav yoho u ubyvayuchoho yoho brata. Vin ubyvav yoho, ta zakinchyvsya z losers

BOH todi poslav raven pochukhaty hrunt, shchob navchyty yoho yak pokhovaty yoho trup brata. Vin skazav, "Prykroshchi do meni; YA ne spromihsya shchob buty take rozumne yak tse raven, ta khovayu miy trup brata." Vin stav yikhav z remorse

Vnaslidok tse, my ukhvalyly dlya Ditey Izrayilya shcho budʹ-yakyy odyn khto vbyvaye budʹ-yaku osobu shcho ne zdiysnyla vbyvstvo abo horrendous zlochyny, tse bude tak, yakby vin vbyv vsikh lyudey. Ta budʹ khto khto ekonomytʹ zhyttya, tse bude tak, yakby vin zekonomyv zhyttya vsikh lyudey. Nashi kur'yery poyikhaly yim z yasnymy dokazamy ta vidkryttyamy, ale bilʹshistʹ yikh, zreshtoyu tse, dosi porushuyutʹ

spravedlyvyy retribution dlya tsykh khto boryutʹsya BOH ta Yoho kur'yer, ta zdiysnyuyutʹ horrendous zlochyny, musytʹ buty ubytyy, abo crucified, abo shchob maty yikhni ruky ta nohy vidrizani na zminnykh storonakh, abo shchob buty zaslani z zemli. Tse musytʹ prynyzyty yim u tse zhyttya, todi vony zaznayutʹ dalekoho hirshoho retribution u U maybutnʹomu
Zvilʹnenyy ye tsey khto kayutʹsya pered tym, yak vy dolayete yikh. Vy musyte znaty shcho BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
O vy shcho vvazhayete, vy budete BOH povahy ta shukayete shlyakhiv ta zasobiv yomu, ta dokladayete zusylʹ u Yoho prychyni, shcho vy mozhete maty uspikh

Zvychayno, tsey khto disbelieved, yakshcho vony ovolodily vse na zemli, navitʹ dvichi yak znachno, ta zaproponuvaly tse tomu shcho vykup zekonomyty yikh retribution na Dni Resurrection, by ne yomu vyznanyy z nykh; vony zaznaly bolisnoho retribution
Vony budutʹ zakhotity do Pekla vykhodu, ale na zhalʹ!, vony mozhutʹ nikoly ne vykhid zvidty; yikhniy retribution ye vichnyy
zlodiy, muzhchyna abo zhinka, vy budete vidznachyty yikhni ruky yak pokarannya dlya yikhnʹoho zlochynu, ta shchob sluzhyty yak pryklad z BOHA. BOH ye Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
Yakshcho kozhnyy kayetʹsya pislya toho yak zdiysnyuvaty tsey zlochyn, ta reformy, BOH vykupovuye yoho. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
vy ne znayete shcho BOH volodiye suverenitetom neba ta zemli? Vin karaye whomever Vin wills, ta probachaye whomever Vin wills. BOH Omnipotent
